instructions: Navigate to your iPhone or iPad's Settings . Tap Messages (on the iPad's left-side menu; scroll down to find Messages in your iPhone's Settings ). Tap Send & Receive . This screen lists the phone numbers and email addresses associated with the Apple ID. Uncheck any phone number or email account from which you don't want to receive message to or reply from. Choose to send and receive only to an email address and remove your actual phone number completely, if you prefer. Select at least one phone number or email address to receive iMessages to and reply from. If you don't want to use iMessage at all, turn off the feature in the previous screen by tapping the switch next to iMessage . If you opt to use two addresses, such as your phone number and your email address, choose which one to use by default via the Start New Conversations From setting. This setting will show up only if you choose to send messages from two sources.
